When logging in, your personal data will be uploaded to the remote server and the guest mode will be permanently closed

The network is not good, please check the network condition!
1.Why we can not receive data from the scale?
2.Why did show Err2 in the fat scale when i weighing it?
3.Why we had to disconnect bluetooth with other device before using the blue scales normally?

1.Make sure that Bluetooth turned on the device;
2.Make sure no other devices turn on Bluetooth and run the same software;
3.Android mobile phone need to turn on GPS;
5.Barefoot on the scale can enter the fat-measuring mode and obtain the fat data.
2.Wet foot, please dry your foot and test again;
3.The parameters of human body are not set correctly (the height is 100~220cm and the age is more than 10 years old).
4.Standing in the wrong position, Please ensure to stand on both poles (or ITO film).
Bluetooth cann t connect with multiple devices at the same time, before Before connecting with bluetooth scale, other bluetooth devices must be disconnected。

The scale has an ITO conductive film on its surface, and no damage to weak bioelectricity circulates in the body, measured by the BIA bioelectrical impedance method. Principle: Muscle contains more blood and other water, conductive, fat is not conductive. Therefore, the resistance can be calculated by the micro-current through the body and the fat rate can be measured。

The diet and exercise methods of human in life will have an energy intake and expenditure on the body, so the daily weighing data will fluctuate slightly. When weighed, the HealthU+ measures based on your current physical condition。
Because the built-in low-power energy-saving Bluetooth 4.0, the scale must rely on the Bluetooth pairing combination of the phone to use。
The following people need to pay attention to below aspects before weighing:
1.Android phones require Bluetooth version 4.0 and above, and need to reach 4.4 and above system versions。 \n2.The iphone needs a system that reaches 8.0 and above, with ipad 3 and above。"
1.Check whether the mobile phone Bluetooth open normally(Android phone needs to open authority of the GPS positioning)
2. Open app, click "pls stand on the scale" button on the home Page;
3. Stand on the scale with bare feet for ensuring scale is under power on
4. Data stability, flashing three times, then means the app received data successfully;

BIA Bioelectrical Impedance measurement method needs to use your height, age, gender,combined with the weight and body impedance information to calculate the fat rate. \nWe will keep your body information confidential and ensure that this information is used only for the application of the fat rate algorithm and not for any other purpose

After successful login, we will synchronize your personal information, including all the measurement data to the server, so as to prevent data loss, the next time you want to change the mobile phone, only need to input account, you can sync all the historical measurement data and personal information. \nWe guarantee the data stored in the server, just to keep your personal data, to prevent loss, do not use any other purposes
Successful login means that you agree to sync your personal data to the server, so you cannot continue to use tourist mode if you successfully log on
Click “Mine” in Main interface ------unit conversion--Select the unit--return to the main interface-receive the balance transmission of a stable set of data - scale unit synchronization success

Reminder 
Please turn on the bluetooth of your mobile phone and turn on the location permission..
Please go on the scale with bare feet.
If there is no data, please try to restart bluetooth or mobile phone and check bluetooth status!
Google Fit gives you control over mulitipel health data from apps and devices.
By connecting Google Fit and HealthU+ APP, you will be able to detect multiple physical data during operation!
FitBit inspires you to reach your health and htenss goals by tracking your activities, exercise, sleep,weight and other factors
Body Weight is the weight of person who wear no clothes。
You are too thin, gastrointestinal absorption is bad for single meal with too much intake, you can make improvement by increasing number of meals。
Weight is quite healthy, remember to eat on time ~ Congratulations on your weight has reached your set goals, keep going on like this！

In a very dangerous weight range, you are in high risk to suffer from high blood pressure, heart disease, diabetes and other metabolic diseases, please immediately reduce the high oil and high calorie food intake, start from the daily walk, and strive to restore healthy weight and figure。
BMI (Body Mass Index) is an international standard of body fatness and thinness. We use standards that apply to the European and American physique。
The current BMI index is low, belonging to the thin people. There is a little distance from the standard figure！
At present, the BMI is normal and the body index is perfect. We must continue to maintain！
The current BMI index is high, and there is still a little distance from the standard figure！
Higher BMI index, higher risk of heart disease, high blood pressure and other diseases, please pay attention to improving living habits!

The current increase in muscle strength makes the body more fit! Strength training helps stimulate muscle growth and increase body consumption. Dietary supplements are needed for protein supplementation. Chicken breast, shrimp, and egg white are all good choices！

To maintain a regular lifestyle,exercise less and stay up late, andarrange 2-3 times a week to maintain thebody\'s basal metabolism and enhance the body\'s abilityto circulate Remember to relax after exercise。

The current recommendation is to reduce fat, and 2-3 times aweek high-intensity interval training can help to quickly burn fat and improve heart and lungfunction. The principle of fat loss is greater consumption than consumption, as long as adhereto exercise and reasonable control of intake, will soon be able to lose weight！

The current need to strictlycontrol the intake, please stay away fromhigh-calorie foods; at the same timeincrease the amount of exercise helps to consume fat,do not choose to exercise on the larger knee pressure,such as running, beating。
BMR refers to the human body in a sober and extremely quiet state, not affected by muscle activity, environmentaltemperature, food and mental stress, such as the impact of energy metabolic rate。
BMR below standard! Dieting, staying up late, lack of exercise will lead to low BMR, hard consumption on fat
Congratulations, your BMR meet standard level！

Strength training can improve basal metabolism and increase energy consumption. We suggest you to eat more protein-rich foods such as chicken breasts, egg white and so on.Protein consumes more energy than carbohydrates and fats, and calories are consumed by the body\'s consumption of protein。
BMR is tightly related to diet, rest and exercise, keep a healthy rest and balanced meal, adhere to exercise at least once a week, those will keep you out of gaining weight！
The proportion of human body water in weight. that is part of aperson\'s composition. Plenty of water can promote metabolism in the body。
Keeping plenty of water can boost your body s metabolism and take away your body s waste and toxins。
Congratulations, your BMR meet standard level！
Currently belong to edema physique, the reason is the body s lack of water, can not promote metabolism, the body s excess trace elements excreted, stranded in the body。
Weight loss, if the water decreased but no change in body fat, the part of the reduction may be the body s water shortage, metabolic disorder, indicating that the weight loss method is not scientific

Keep a regular diet and rest, eight cups of water a day to maintain the normal level! If there is exercise, please pay attention to replenish moisture, make up for excessive sweating caused by water loss。
Attention to replenish moisture, promote body metabolism, water excretion can take away the body of trace elements and waste garbage, so that the internal environment to maintain a healthy cycle！

Body fat percentage refers to the percentage of body weight in adipose tissue in the human body. A high body weight is not equal to fat, but a high fat rate is a sign of obesity. The only way to lose weight is to lose fat。
The current body fat rate is low. When fat is not enough to supply energy to the body s daily activities, it will consume protein, and excessive protein consumption will damage human tissue。
Congratulations, body fat rate is normal and you must keep it！
Excessive body fat indicates excessive fat intake and lack of exercise. It can lead to cardiovascular and cerebrovascular diseases such as diabetes and hypertension in the long-term. Please be alert！
Excessive body fat indicates excessive fat intake and lack of exercise. It can lead to cardiovascular and cerebrovascular diseases such as diabetes and hypertension in the long-term. Please be alert！

Fats are divided into saturated fatty acids and unsaturated fatty acids. Unsaturated fatty acids are easily decomposed and are not easy to accumulate into fat. The body can supplement energy by appropriate intake. Nuts, soybeans, sunflower seeds, and peanuts are all good choices。
keep exercising and eat properly! Adhere to exercise can improve basal metabolism, help eliminate the fatigue caused by work, work and rest can make the work more efficient Oh！
The current recommendation is to reduce fat, 2-3 times a week to help burn fat, high-intensity intermittent exercise to extend the time of fat burning, lying down after exercise will be thin ~

At present, it is necessary to strictly control calorie intake and consume excess body fat through exercise. Reduce fat period need to keep consumption more than intake, a reasonable diet can make the fat-reducing efforts more effective
The total muscle weight, including skeletal muscle,cardiac and smooth muscle. The higher the muscle mass rate, the greater the BMR, the more calories consumed, it is not easy to gain weight。

Too little exercise and dieting are important causes of muscle loss. Muscle is the main force of energy consumption, increase the muscle to increase the calorie consumption, in a healthy way to lose the excess fat。
Congratulations, your muscle mass standard,keep it up!
Muscle is the main force of energy consumption, increase the muscle to increase the calorie consumption, in a healthy way to lose the excess fat。

Muscle Enhancement Stage requires energy support, which needs to be kept in greater consumption, especially sugar and protein. High protein food can choose chicken breast, egg white and so on. Sugar can be ingested from carbohydrates such as various cereals, sweet potatoes and so on。

Muscle Enhancement Stage requires energy support, which needs to be kept in greater consumption, especially sugar and protein. High protein food can choose chicken breast, egg white and so on. Sugar can be ingested from carbohydrates such as various cereals, sweet potatoes and so on。
At present, your muscle mass is relatively sufficient, please continue to maintain the appropriate amount of exercise and a reasonable diet。

Visceral fat is a kind of body fat, and subcutaneous fat is different, mainly in the abdominal cavity, around the human organs. A certain amount of fat can play the role of supporting, stabilizing and protecting the viscera。
Visceral fat level is normal, appropriate visceral fat can significantly reduce the risk of cardio-cerebral vascular disease！
Hoarding in the heart around the fat too much, will lead to internal organs, heart disease, high blood pressure and other diseases of higher incidence, please pay attention to vigilance！
Hoarding in the heart around the fat too much, will lead to internal organs, heart disease, high blood pressure and other diseases of higher incidence, please pay attention to vigilance！
Balanced diet, refuse to high calorie food, keep regular rest and rest, health will always accompany your clatter！
Keep the diet light, eat less high-calorie food, stick to exercise, after a 30-minute walk after meals, conducive to food digestion, drive energy consumption!

Bone mass refers to the weight of bone tissue in the body, representing the health of the skeleton. Bone tissue is composed of cell, fiber and matrix, fiber is bone collagen fiber, The matrix contains a lot of solid inorganic salts。

Your bone level is low, which can lead to backache, hunchback, easy fracture and other symptoms. Pay attention to the control of alcohol, coffee and strong tea intake, which will accelerate the loss of calcium in the bone。
Your bone mass level standard. Bone mass will not change significantly in the short term, so you can maintain a healthy bone level by maintaining a healthy diet and exercising properly。

Your bone mass level is high, which indicates that your living habits are healthier and nutrient intake is reasonable. As bone mass does not change significantly in the short term, you can maintain a healthy level of bone mass by ensuring a healthy diet and proper exercise。

The absorption rate of calcium is very low, you need to eat more food with calcium. Long-term car travel, excessive sun exposure will also cause bone loss gradually, walk 10 minutes every day after lunch can help maintain calcium supplementation

The absorption rate of calcium is very low, you need to eat more food with calcium. Long-term car travel, excessive sun exposure will also cause bone loss gradually, walk 10 minutes every day after lunch can help maintain calcium supplementation

The absorption rate of calcium is very low, you need to eat more food with calcium. Long-term car travel, excessive sun exposure will also cause bone loss gradually, walk 10 minutes every day after lunch can help maintain calcium supplementation

Fat-free weight, also known as lean body mass, it refers to the total weight except for the fat, it includes body cells, extracellular water and fat-free solid parts, they are mainly bones and muscles. Fat-free weight is related with physical performance, the higher the fat-free weight rate is, the strong exercise ability you would have. Athletes often have a larger at-free weight.

Obesity is one of the ten chronic diseases identified by the World Health Organization. Obesity affects the appearance of the body, obese people are more susceptible to diseases such as diabetes, heart disease, vascular disease, hepatic lipidosis syndrome, arthritis and other diseases.

Subcutaneous fat rate refers to the ratio of adipose tissue and body weight stored under the skin. It can be used as an indicator for judging the body fat and lean degree. Subcutaneous fat is located below the dermis layer, above the fascia layer, the main function is to maintain body temperature and storage energy. When subcutaneous fat is too much, it is easy to accumulate in the abdomen, buttocks, thigh parts, so that the body will be out of shape, which will have adverse effects on health.

Your subcutaneous fat rate is lower than standard. this is caused by thinness and low body fat rate. If the body is too thin, and accompanied by fatigue, pain and other symptoms of non-gloss skin, you may need to consider the possibility of malnutrition, pay attention to nutrition supplement and keep actively exercise.
Certain subcutaneous fat can protect the internal organs and bone health, so instead of dieting, you should have a balanced nutrition and enough calories intake.
Your subcutaneous fat rate is within the normal range, please maintain a balanced diet, exercise regularly, then you may be healthy and stay in a good shape.
Your subcutaneous fat rate is in the standard range, so continue your healthy diet and exercise.

Your subcutaneous fat rate is higher than standard, high sugar, high fat diet, sedentary habit and genetic factors are the causes of high subcutaneous fat rate. It is an indicator of various metabolic diseases. We recommend you to control the intake of high sugar and high fat food, eat more vegetables and fruits, exercise 3-5 times a week, then you will be healthier.

You need to control the weight within the standard range, so a regular diet and moderate exercise is necessary. Subcutaneous fat accumulation will cause obesity, and do harm to your figure and health.

Your subcutaneous fat rate is much higher than standard, it will gain body weight and are threatens to joints and heart. It is an indicator of various metabolic diseases. We recommend you to control the intake of high sugar and high fat food, eat more vegetables and fruits, exercise 3-5 times a week, then you will be healthier.
Your subcutaneous fat rate is gravely high and you need to lose weight. For severe obesity, you are advised to consult a professional doctor for the treatment of obesity.
The main reason for low level of protein is that your body fat is high. Please be aware of controlling your diet, do regular exercises, these will help to reduce body fat.
Your protein level is normal, we recommend you to keep a balanced diet and exercise regularly.
The main reason for high protein level is that your body fat is too low. It is recommended to maintain a balanced diet and exercise more.
Protein is an important nutrient for muscle growth and other activities. You can get protein from daily food, like eggs, milk, beans. They are good quality protein sources with low fat.
Lack of protein can lead to immunity declination, muscle weakness and anemia. Having a balanced diet could keep protein in a reasonable level.
Do not make a excessive diet, keep balanced diet, then you can maintain a stable protein level.
Low protein is the result of insufficient nutritional intake or indigestion. Lack of protein can cause immunity decline, muscle weakness and anemia, so that the body BMR lower。

Protein is an important component of cells and tissues, possesses approximately 18% out of the total body weight. Almost all activities in your body need protein, it is one of the principal participants.
Body age bases on BMR, it is a combination of weight, height, fat, muscle and other indicators of the value, mainly depends on lifestyle and health status.
Your body age is young, which indicates that the functions of your body are in good condition, please keep it up!
Maintain a healthy lifestyle, keep on exercising, keep a reasonable schedule and balanced diet, they will make you energetic and young!
Your body age is relatively older than actual age, which indicates the slight aging of your body function. Staying up late, lack of exercises might lead to older body age.

Please maintain a healthy schedule and less staying up late, eat less greasy and high calorie food. Exercises will keep your metabolic cycle at a stable level, which will make you young and energetic!
With good body, you can have better performance.
Physical condition is not so good, your health risk is relatively large.
Your body score is low. To prevent the chronic diseases, both excessive and insufficient intake of calories are undesirable.
Your body condition is on average level. please exercise regularly.
Your body score is average, and it is essential to have a regular lifestyle, healthy and nutritious diet and suitable exercise.
Your body condition is good, please maintain a health diet and exercise regularly.
Your body score is good. You should quit bad habits, and keep a healthy diet and suitable exercise.
Your body condition is very good, please keep it up.
Your body score is very good, please keep it.
General description and evaluation of body shape
Standard weight is one of the important indicators to reflect people\'s health status. Being too fat or too thin is not health status.

Being underweight is not good for your health, Excludes the Weight loss cases influenced by thyroid, digestive system diseases, diabetes and other disease factors, we should increase the intake of various nutrients, do moderate exercise, and gradually increase the weight to the normal range.
Make sure of a balanced diet, enough calories intake, more exercise in strength, such as push-ups, pull-ups, barbells, dumbbells and so on.
Stay in a good mood, exercise regularly, maintain a balanced diet and good sleep.
Your body mass index (bmi) is in the standard range. Keep your healthy diet and suitable exercise to maintain a healthy weight.

Overweight, you should control the diet, eat less sweet food and snacks, eat more vegetables. In the meantime, please exercise regularly, increase calorie consumption. You will maintain standard weight soon.
You need to control weight gain further and loss weight duly to prevent obesity and its complications. Such as change your lifestyle and diet habit, and exercise moderately.
Obesity increases the risks of cerebrovascular and slow metabolism diseases. Please start your weight management now, control diet and exercise regularly. This is good way to prevent obesity.
You need to lose 3-10% of your body weight, control caloric intake strictly every day, and develop a healthy lifestyle.

Obesity in high level. Please pay more attention to your weight management and try to lose weight to standard range. A balanced diet with aerobic exercise is a good way to lose weight. Please also avoid exercises that may cause knee injury, like running and jumping. You can get advice from professionals or doctors.
You need to lose more than 10% of your body weight to effectively improve obesity-related complications. For serious complications of obesity, you are advised to seek medical advice in time.

Obesity in dangerous level, please start controlling your diet immediately. You could try sports like swimming and hiking to lose weight. In the meantime, we recommend to seek medical advice, use healthy and effective ways to restore weight to standard level.
You are grossly overweight and are advised to consult a professional doctor for the treatment of obesity.

1.What if the body fat scales is not accurate?

The accuracy of body fat scales has something to do with where you put it. First, make sure it is placed on a solid and flat ground. Extra note: it is best measured when you are cleared, for example, weigh yourself when you get up in the morning or wear few clothes. Pay attention to the weighing method: take off shoes and socks before measurement, do not leave or shake until the display of the data. The next weighing should be done after the screen is off for 2–3 seconds.
2.When is it more accurate to weigh?

Be sure to measure with bare feet and make sure the soles of feet are dry. It is recommended to measure at a fixed time every day to reduce errors caused by external factors such as exercise, diet and hot bath. The optimal frequency is twice a day. Measure in the morning after defecating and before bathing, and before bathing in the evening. Meanwhile, because of human body\'s metabolism, the physical data measured in the morning and evening will have some fluctuations. It is recommended not to simply compare the data measured at different times.
3.Why do the weighing data vary from different ground surfaces?

The sensor of the body fat scales is highly sensitive. When measuring, it should be placed on a solid and flat ground. If the ground is uneven or placed on soft grounds such as blankets and foam, the data may be inaccurate.
4.Why is there no content displayed on the screen of body fat scales during measurement?

The usual reasons are: if the battery runs out, please replace the battery in time; if the battery is installed backwards, the trouble can be solved by installing the battery correctly according to the tips of body fat scales.
5.Why does the App only show weight data and not body fat rate and other data?

Reason 1: the current user is less than 10 years old. Due to the rapid growth and development of children, it is impossible to measure and calculate accurate body fat rate data. If you accidentally set the age by mistake, you can modify it in \"Me\" – \"Personal information\"\nReason 2: feet are not in good contact with the electrodes on the surface of the body fat scales. Try cleaning the scales surface with a wet towel and stepping on the scales with bare feet for measurement.\nReason 3: you leave the body fat scales before it accomplishes measuring. The screen displays weight and flashes three times, then \"----\" from left to right to indicate that the measurement of body fat is completed. At this point, body fat and other relevant information can be seen in the App.
6.Will my weighing information be recorded when the App is not opened?

As long as the body fat scales is currently bound to your HealthU+ account and successfully networked (i.e. the Wi-Fi indicator light is on after weighing), the weighing result will be recorded in the App in real time and can be viewed at any time.
7.Why is my weighing result not seen in the App?

Step 1: please confirm whether the Wi-Fi indicator light on the body fat scales is on during the weighing process (if not, it means that the scales has not successfully networked, please reconnect);\nStep 2: enter \"Me\" - \"Device binding\" to check whether the body fat scales is successfully bound to the currently logged in HealthU+ account;\nStep 3: refresh the home page of the body fat scales to see whether it is judged as an \"unknown weight data\" entry. If this happens, click \"claim\" to claim this entry to the corresponding sub-account, and then you can make an accurate match next time.
8.What if the weighing message notification is not received?

Different users can directly bind the body fat scales for use with their respective HealthU+ accounts. You can also create multiple family member accounts under the same HealthU+ account to use together.
9.What if my weighing record is recorded in the other family members\' mobile APPs?

If no other user binds the body fat scales, all weighing records of the scales will be recorded to the only bound user in operation, which can be deleted in history data management. \nIf you don\'t want your family\'s records to be mistakenly synced into your account, one way to do this is to create a subaccount for your family and fill out their body composition details, the second way is to ask family members to use their own HealthU+ account to bind the scales, and timely process the physical data to be claimed, so as to help us judge the data attribution more accurately. If there are multiple errors recorded. Please contact the developer in \"My\" in the app.
1. Please stand on the scale on one foot, close your eyes, and raise your arms
2. When it is difficult to control the body balance, leave the body fat scale
1. Close your eyes during the measurement process, and be sure to open your eyes and stand on your feet before feeling unbalanced to avoid accidents.
2. This method is not recommended for elderly people, people with poor brain vestibular function and poor balance ability.

Standing on one foot with eyes closed

Standing on one foot with eyes closed is a method to measure the time of standing on one foot depending on the balanced movement of the vestibular organs of the brain and the coordinated movement of the whole body muscles without any visual references, reflecting the balanced capacity of human body. The shorter the time, the lower the score, the worse the balance, and eventually, the worse the physical fitness.
Manual and standards on measurement of physical fitness for people standing on one foot with eyes closed

Standing on one foot with eyes closed is a method to measure the time of standing on one foot depending on the balanced movement of the vestibular organs of the brain and the coordinated movement of the whole body muscles without any visual references, reflecting the balanced capacity of human body. The shorter the time, the lower the score, the worse the balance, and eventually, the worse the physical fitness.
Rating standards on measurement of physical fitness for people standing on one foot with eyes closed(Male)
Rating standards on measurement of physical fitness for people standing on one foot with eyes closed(Female)

Beats per minute in a normal quiet state, also called HRrest
Heart rate below 40 beats per minute, could be sick sinus syndrome, atrioventricular block, etc.
Please go to the hospital for detailed diagnosis and treatment

Heart rate below 60 beats per minute (usually above 40), called sinus bradycardia. Caused by diseases mostly, common in cardiac patients, who often experience palpitations, chest tightness, discomfort of the precordial area, etc.
Please rest well. Seek medical advice when feeling unwell or your heart rate is below 45 beats per minute
Please maintain healthy lifestyle, reasonable diet, moderate exercise, and adequate sleep

Normal people will have normal tachycardia when doing strenuous exercise, drinking, doing heavy manual labor, being emotional or taking certain drugs. Tachycardia could also occur in patients with cardiovascular disease, anemia, hypoxia, hyperthyroidism, etc.
Obesity increases the burden on the heart and makes it beat faster. Could be improved by adjusting diet and reasonable exercise. Consult your physician if accompanied by other diseases.
Heart rate greater than 160 beats per minute, common in cardiac patients.
Please seek medical advice and have a detailed examination when suffering from heart palpitations, chest tightness or other discomfort

1. Click Data Backup, complete registration and log in, you can upload and back up the data currently stored locally to the cloud server in real time, which can prevent data loss. \n2. After replacing the device, on your new device, log in to your account to synchronize the data to your new device. \n3. The data is only stored on the cloud server.
